barriers.description: Obstacles or construction barriers are present on the right side of the road, indicating that the area is closed off or undergoing construction.
barriers.explanation: These obstacles may indicate construction or restricted areas, signaling traffic to detour to the right.

other objects.description: There are visible fragments on the road near the parked motorcycles and obstacles, possibly including small items or trash.
other objects.explanation: Debris on the road may pose a risk to the vehicle, causing tire damage or forcing the driver to make unplanned evasive maneuvers.

general_perception.description and explanation: The traffic image reveals the presence of barriers and other objects. Specifically, there are obstacles or construction barriers on the right side of the road, indicating that the area is closed off or undergoing construction. These barriers signal that traffic should detour to the right. Additionally, there are visible fragments on the road near the parked motorcycles and obstacles, which could include small items or trash. This debris poses a risk to the vehicle, potentially causing tire damage or necessitating unplanned evasive maneuvers.

driving_suggestion: Drive carefully and reduce your speed to ensure you have enough time to respond to sudden changes or the movement of parked motorcycles. Pay close attention to other road users who may be temporarily invisible due to dim lighting, and be prepared to stop or take evasive actions at any moment. If possible, safely distance yourself from motorcycles and potential obstacles on the side of the road, leaving them ample space. Lastly, be aware of any debris on the road and avoid it to prevent damage to your vehicle. If necessary, use high beams to improve visibility, provided that it does not affect other road users.

1.description and explanation: This is a moped parked on the side of the road. As a two-wheeled vehicle, this moped could be a potential hazard if it were to unexpectedly enter the roadway. The ego car must be prepared to slow down or change lanes if necessary to avoid a collision in case the moped starts moving.

2.description and explanation: This is a dustbin situated near the edge of the roadway. Its presence should be noted as it could obstruct the view of pedestrians or other objects. The ego car's driving behavior may be influenced by maintaining a safe distance from the roadside obstacle to prevent any contact.
